CheckTitle: RAM password policy requires minimum length of 14 or greater
Description: RAM password policies can be used to ensure password complexity. It is recommended that the password policy require a minimum of 14 or greater characters for any password.
Risk: Enhancing complexity of a password policy increases account resiliency against brute force logon attempts.

Recommendation.Text: Logon to RAM console. Choose Settings. In the Password section, click Modify. In the Length section, enter 14 or a greater number and click OK.
